-- what do you feel are important to you or other people as as crucial benefits
Well Im little different than other people because I dont have benefits with my job

So I find that it makes up for what I pay for insurance and I I make enough money by the hour to make up for that

turns.label: b

Right well I guess thats good point uh
turns.label: b

turns.text: I do belong to large corporation or my that where Im currently employed and theres uh theres some different things uh one that youve already mentioned is is health insurance I think through our health insurance that I can get better rates as through group plan --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- as opposed to going out and getting health insurance on an individual basis because I had to do that at one time when I wasnt employed with large corporation and that got to be somewhat expensive so I --
-- I think one of the benefits I I see is the uh is the group uh group discount
Right and especially if you have family

turns.text: I dont think I would go through that expense One other benefit that you mentioned is the flexible work hours and in my previous job I really enjoyed because they had what was called flex schedule where I could go and I could work uh nine hour days and have like Friday only work four hours --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- or I could do uh work four days week at ten hours day and have you know three - day weekend
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And make uh make my job flexible in that case
Could you change that as you felt like it or did you have to do it the same every week

turns.text: Well basically yeah I had to do that uh the same uh for about every quarter of the year I mean --

turns.text: -- uh because I was in in position of management I had responsibilities over people that uh I needed to make my schedule uh so that if I was not there I would have coverage by some other management personnel so so I I think that uh that was that was an excellent benefit --
-- that I really enjoyed and I dont - have that in my current operation but uh you mentioned uh flexible work schedule and thats thats good
And uh what other benefits do you think are important

turns.text: Yeah with uh with our current uh organization we do have nice retirement package and also nice thing that that we have in our corporation is uh is profit sharing plan where we can uh participate in the the profits of the company If were you know if weve been there while and were vested uh which means that you know we have an interest uh in the company --
turns.label: b
